meaningMnemonic: All the art, music, or books that come out <kanji>after</kanji> a person <kanji>die</kanji>s are considered to be released <vocabulary>after death</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>posthumously</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
